DOC.brief_summary: The Youth Empowerment Solutions Positive Youth Development ( YES ) Study , randomize control trial compare youth standard school program offer activity choice ( e.g . sport , academic enrichment , art ) youth assigned school program include train community development , formation intergenerational partnership experience conduct community improvement project . The study aim : 1 ) implement evaluate empirically develop intervention empower youth ( YES ) use randomize controlled trial design high risk urban suburban sample ; 2 ) test conceptual model posit causal relationship youth empowerment process positive developmental outcome ; 3 ) follow youth time assess sustainability gain healthy development . Developmental outcomes assess baseline , curriculum completion three nine month post-intervention . This study refer Genesee County Afterschool Study ( GCAS ) recruitment , consent , assent promotional material . The study compare different type school program , randomly assign student two group , 1 ) `` regular '' 21st Century Afterschool program 2 ) `` regular '' 21st Century Afterschool program YES supplement . We want bias desirability random group name one group test study name . Therefore , document refer study `` Genesee County Afterschool Study ( GCAS ) . '' Study hypothesis : 1 . Youth YES intervention arm demonstrate increase intrapersonal , interactional , behavioral empowerment youth comparison group arm . 2 . Youth YES intervention arm demonstrate high score positive developmental outcome variable , low score negative developmental outcome variable , youth comparison group arm . 3 . Behavioral empowerment partially mediate relation intrapersonal interactional empowerment youth developmental outcome , youth great intrapersonal interactional empowerment skill demonstrate increase behavioral empowerment , turn result high score positive developmental outcome variable , low score negative developmental outcome variable .
DOC.brief_title: Youth Empowerment Solutions Positive Youth Development
DOC.detailed_description: YES partnership University Michigan School Public Health , Flint Community Schools Genesee County Intermediate School District . The study include participant eight high-need middle school 21st Century school program . Researchers consistently find participation school program enhance adolescent ' well sense worth , involve positive behavior help avoid involvement problem behavior . Although key element successful school program propose ( e.g. , adult mentorship ) , process youth positive outcome achieve rarely empirically examine . Empowerment theory provide unique conceptual framework develop program enhance positive youth development incorporate notion health promotion require youth develop specific skill positive asset , also youth become motivated actively apply skill knowledge become agent positive change community . Thus , program base empowerment theory focus build positive asset , connect youth local resource adult role model , engage youth community service activity . Ecological theory complement empowerment theory focus attention social context youth develop , interaction contexts , role youth play context ( e.g. , school , community ) . An intervention approach inform two theory enhance positive youth development engage youth relevant ecological setting learn skill , practice skill , establish social resource effectively navigate social context find develop healthy adult .
